se.jguru.nazgul.core.xmlbinding.spi.jaxb.transport

Interface JaxbConverterRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJaxbConverterRegistry

    public interface JaxbConverterRegistry
    Usage specification for a registry holding JAXB converters.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addConverters(Object... converters)
      Adds the supplied converters to this DefaultJaxbConverterRegistry.

      <OriginalType,TransportType>

      Converts the provided transport type instance (back) to its original type, ready for normal use.

    • Method Detail

      • addConverters

        void addConverters(Object... converters)
            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Adds the supplied converters to this DefaultJaxbConverterRegistry.
        Parameters:
        converters - The converter instances to add.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any of the supplied converters had no Converter-annotated methods or constructors.

      • getTransportType

        <TransportType,OriginalType> Class<TransportType> getTransportType(Class<OriginalType> originalType)
        Acquires the TransportType for the supplied originalType.
        Type Parameters:
        TransportType - The JAXB-annotated TransportType corresponding to the supplied originalType;
        OriginalType - The OriginalType for which we would like to acquire the JAXB-annotated TransportType.
        Parameters:
        originalType - The original (i.e. non-transport) type for which we want to acquire the corresponding TransportType.
        Returns:
        The Class of the TransportType for the supplied OriginalType.

      • getOriginalType

        <OriginalType,TransportType> Class<OriginalType> getOriginalType(Class<TransportType> transportType)
                                                          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Acquires the OriginalType for the supplied transportType.
        Type Parameters:
        TransportType - The JAXB-annotated TransportType corresponding to the supplied originalType;
        OriginalType - The type previously converted to the supplied TransportType.
        Parameters:
        transportType - The [JAXB annotated] TransportType type for which we want to acquire the corresponding OriginalType.
        Returns:
        The Class of the OriginalType for the supplied TransportType.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the transportType was JaxbAnnotatedNull.

      • packageForTransport

        <OriginalType,TransportType> TransportType packageForTransport(OriginalType source)
                                                        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Converts the provided instance to a transport type, ready for transmission in serialized form.
        Type Parameters:
        TransportType - The JAXB-annotated TransportType corresponding to the supplied originalType;
        OriginalType - The OriginalType for which we would like to acquire the JAXB-annotated TransportType.
        Parameters:
        source - The object to convert.
        Returns:
        The converted object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the conversion failed.

      • resurrectAfterTransport

        <OriginalType,TransportType> OriginalType resurrectAfterTransport(TransportType toConvert)
                                                           throws IllegalArgumentException
        Converts the provided transport type instance (back) to its original type, ready for normal use.
        Type Parameters:
        TransportType - The JAXB-annotated TransportType corresponding to the supplied originalType;
        OriginalType - The OriginalType for which we would like to acquire the JAXB-annotated TransportType.
        Parameters:
        toConvert - The transport type to be converted.
        Returns:
        The resurrected object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the conversion failed.
